column4: My usb speakers doesn't work with ubuntu. Does anyone know why ?
do you see them listed in lsusb?
Yes it is listed under lsusb
did you set your application to use the device, rather than your soundcard?
no not really. I don't know how to do that.
say if I want to watch flash videos in browser
do yu hear the audio through your soundcard?
Yes. I have a head phone pluged in which works just fine
then the sound card is the device being used for sound, not your speakers
Any way to change the settings ?
if the application doesnt let you choose, then you have to look online for answers, namely google
I searched in the forums. Many other users are complaining about the same thing but no solutions :(
